data.text: @Tellwut @Walmart @Cosmopolitan I personally think that all those people that are so offended by a magazine are so sexually deprived yet they are too embarrassed to invest in a vibrator and let go of all their frustrations. I have better things to do than go leafing thru magazines at the checkout or otherwise.

@Tellwut @Walmart @Cosmopolitan I think it is a good idea, because now a days sex sells, and I don't think our youth should have to be exposed to sex when they are not mature enough to handle it and what it really means.

@Tellwut @Walmart @Cosmopolitan I don't see the point in this. I don't read the magazine, but I don't see a problem with it either. To me, it just sounds like @Walmart trying to please the few. #Cosmopolitan #PaidSurvey #MarketResearch
